Uses of Interface
pitt.search.semanticvectors.VectorStore

  • Packages that use VectorStore 
    Package Description
    pitt.search.semanticvectors
    Semantic Vector indexes, created by applying a Random Projection algorithm to term-document matrices created using Apache Lucene.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.orthography
    Package for orthographic representation, i.e., making vectors based on the characters that occur in a string.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.tables
    Package for creating semantic vectors from tabular data.
    pitt.search.semanticvectors.viz
    Contains various classes for plotting results in two dimensions.

    • Uses of VectorStore in pitt.search.semanticvectors

      Subinterfaces of VectorStore in pitt.search.semanticvectors 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  CloseableVectorStore
      Some vector stores (e.g., those that read from the filesystem) claim resources that aren't automatically garbage collected or released.
      Classes in pitt.search.semanticvectors that implement VectorStore 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DocVectors
      Implementation of vector store that collects doc vectors by iterating through all the terms in a term vector store and incrementing document vectors for each of the documents containing that term.
      class  ElementalVectorStore
      Encapsulates the generation of elemental vectors.
      class  IncrementalTermVectors
      Generates term vectors incrementally (i.e.
      class  SRI
      Symmetric Random Indexing (SRI), an alternative to RI that (like RRI) addresses the issue of indirect inference.
      class  VectorStoreDeterministic
      This class provides methods for retrieving vectors that are computed on the fly in a deterministic way.
      class  VectorStoreOrthographical
      This class provides methods for retrieving vectors that are computed using the orthographical techniques in NumberRepresentation.
      class  VectorStoreRAM
      This class provides methods for reading a VectorStore into memory as an optimization if batching many searches.
      class  VectorStoreReaderLucene
      This class provides methods for reading a VectorStore from disk.
      class  VectorStoreReaderText
      This class provides methods for reading a VectorStore from a textfile.
      Methods in pitt.search.semanticvectors that return VectorStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static VectorStore VectorSearcher.expandSearchSpace(VectorStore searchVecStore, FlagConfig flagConfig)
      Expand search space for dual-predicate searches
      VectorStore TermVectorsFromLucene.getElementalDocVectors()
      Returns the object's elemental doc vectors.
      VectorStore TermVectorsFromLucene.getSemanticTermVectors()
      Returns the trained semantic vectors.
      VectorStore TermTermVectorsFromLucene.getSemanticTermVectors()
      Returns the semantic (learned) vectors.
      VectorStore DocVectors.makeWriteableVectorStore()
      Create a version of the vector store indexes by path / filename rather than Lucene ID.
      Methods in pitt.search.semanticvectors with parameters of type VectorStore 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void IncrementalDocVectors.createIncrementalDocVectors(VectorStore termVectorData, FlagConfig flagConfig, LuceneUtils luceneUtils)
      Creates incremental doc vectors, getting everything it needs from a TermVectorsFromLucene object and a Lucene Index directory, and writing to a named file.
      static VectorStoreRAM VectorStoreRAM.createRedistributedVectorStore(VectorStore source, FlagConfig flagConfig, int sampleSize)
      Creates a new vector store by redistributing the coordinates in the given vector store to make the coordinates distributed roughly uniformly between -1 and 1.
      static TermVectorsFromLucene TermVectorsFromLucene.createTermVectorsFromLucene(FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore elementalDocVectors)
      Creates term vectors from a Lucene index.
      static VectorStore VectorSearcher.expandSearchSpace(VectorStore searchVecStore, FlagConfig flagConfig)
      Expand search space for dual-predicate searches
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getBalancedBoundProductQueryVectorFromString(FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore elementalVectors, VectorStore semanticVectors, VectorStore predicateVectors, LuceneUtils lUtils2, String queryString) 
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getBoundProductQueryIntersectionFromString(FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore elementalVectors, VectorStore semanticVectors, VectorStore predicateVectors, LuceneUtils lUtils, String queryString)
      Method gets a query vector from a query string of the form: concept1*relation2+concept3*relation4 the resulting vector will be the intersection of the bound product of concept1 and relation 1, and the bound product of concept 2 and relation 2 (binaryvectors only for the moment)
      static ArrayList<Vector> CompoundVectorBuilder.getBoundProductQuerySubspaceFromString(FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore elementalVectors, VectorStore semanticVectors, VectorStore predicateVectors, String queryString)
      Method gets a query subspace from a query string of the form: E(C1)*S(C2) + E(C3)*S(C4) This method facilitates the combination of single or dual predicate paths using the quantum OR operator, or a binary approximation thereof.
      static ArrayList<Vector> CompoundVectorBuilder.getBoundProductQuerySubSpaceFromString(FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore vecReader, Vector conceptVector, String queryString)
      Method gets a query subspace from a query string of the form: relation1*relation2+relation3*relation4 The resulting subspace (or binary approximation) will be derived from the bound product of concept1 and r1*r2, and the bound product of the concept vector and relation r3*r4.
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getBoundProductQueryVectorFromString(FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore vecReader, String queryString)
      Method gets a query vector from a query string of the form: concept1*relation2+concept3*relation4 the resulting vector will be the bundle of the bound product of concept1 and relation 1, and the bound product of concept 2 and relation 2
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getBoundProductQueryVectorFromString(FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore elementalVectors, VectorStore semanticVectors, VectorStore predicateVectors, LuceneUtils lUtils, String queryString) 
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getPermutedQueryVector(VectorStore vecReader, LuceneUtils luceneUtils, FlagConfig flagConfig, String[] queryTerms)
      Returns a vector representation containing both content and positional information
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getQueryVector(VectorStore vecReader, LuceneUtils luceneUtils, FlagConfig flagConfig, String[] queryTerms)
      Gets a query vector from an array of query terms.
      static Vector CompoundVectorBuilder.getQueryVectorFromString(VectorStore vecReader, LuceneUtils lUtils, FlagConfig flagConfig, String queryString)
      Method gets a query vector from a query string, i.e., a space-separated list of queryterms.
      static void VectorStoreWriter.writeToIndexOutput(VectorStore objectVectors, FlagConfig flagConfig, org.apache.lucene.store.IndexOutput outputStream)
      Writes the object vectors to this Lucene output stream.
      static void VectorStoreWriter.writeToTextBuffer(VectorStore objectVectors, FlagConfig flagConfig, BufferedWriter outBuf) 
      static void VectorStoreWriter.writeVectors(String storeName, FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore objectVectors)
      Writes vectors in text or lucene format depending on FlagConfig.indexfileformat.
      static void VectorStoreWriter.writeVectorsInLuceneFormat(String vectorFileName, FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore objectVectors)
      Outputs a vector store in Lucene binary format.
      static void VectorStoreWriter.writeVectorsInTextFormat(String vectorFileName, FlagConfig flagConfig, VectorStore objectVectors)
      Outputs a vector store as a plain text file.
